statement.name: GetNychaExpenseCategoriesByRevenue
statement.sql:
SELECT expenditure_type_description AS expense_category, expenditure_type_id, SUM(adopted_amount) AS adopted_amount, SUM(modified_amount) AS modified_amount, SUM(revenue_amount) AS recognized_amount, SUM(funds_available)AS funds_available FROM revenue
GROUP BY expenditure_type_description,expenditure_type_id

statement.name: GetNychaResponsibilityCenterByRevenue
statement.sql:
SELECT responsibility_center_description AS responsibility_center, responsibility_center_id, SUM(adopted_amount) AS adopted_amount, SUM(modified_amount) AS modified_amount, SUM(revenue_amount) AS recognized_amount, SUM(funds_available)AS funds_available FROM revenue
GROUP BY responsibility_center_description, responsibility_center_id

statement.name: GetNychaFundingSourceByRevenue
statement.sql:
SELECT a.funding_source_id, b.display_funding_source_descr AS funding_source, SUM(adopted_amount) AS adopted_amount, SUM(modified_amount) AS modified_amount, SUM(revenue_amount) AS recognized_amount, SUM(funds_available)AS funds_available FROM revenue a JOIN ref_funding_source b ON a.funding_source_id = b.funding_source_id
GROUP BY a.funding_source_id,b.display_funding_source_descr
